title: About Me
text: I bring a wealth of cultural experience, transferable skills and personal drive. I am wanderlust who has traveleld across 16 countries and appreciates cultural diversity, dancing and playing golf. My professional interests are in personal development, organisational transformation and leadership. So I hope to make a difference through consulting practice.

title: Caroline Nyadzayo | MBA Portfolio
text:
Professional Bio

A seasoned marketer and effective project manager with over 15 years of experience and a proven track record of success across diverse industries, including tourism, food and beverage, advertising, and consumer goods. I have a versatile skill set from franchise operations, project management and strategic marketing, leveraging interpersonal communication and collaborative problem solving to deliver business objectives.

title: Caroline Nyadzayo | MBA Portfolio
text:
My Portfolio

Portfolio: Campaigns & Projects
I spearheaded several projects across multiple markets in Southern Africa (including Zimbabwe, South Africa, Mozambique, Zambia, Namibia, Botswana), collaborating with cross-functional franchise teams on new product developments and consumer-centric brand campaigns
As part of my MBA program, I have also had the opportunity to participate in various projects.
Research Report
An A+ grade research report for the launch of a long term care home in British Columbia



The Marketing Playbook
To reposition a boutique consulting firm in Vancouver for expansion into DEI opportunities


Digital Strategy
A digital strategy for a music awards brand in Canada. Our goal was to increase awareness, drive traffic to the website, and boost participation in the awards.


Cappy Delight Launch in Mozambique
Spearheaded the project for Cappy Delight Juice launch as a challenger brand

Results

Cappy Delight became No.1 juice brand in the country in less than 6 months
Achieved 39.9% volume share by June 2023
Gained value share at 36.2%


Sparletta Campaign launch in South Africa
Led the strategic repositioning of Sparletta beverages targeting Gen Z users

Results

Volume growth of 6% vs prior year
Reaching 8 million viewers in a PR campaign partnership with a South African TV show
Surprise and delight stunt reaching 1.2million consumers across key stores
